house_listing.house_description: Meticulous Colonial on Large Treed Lot. Ceramicfloor in kitchen & eating area. Doorwalls todeck from dining room, family room & mastersuite. Private bath in master suite. Newcarpeting, newer counter tops in kitchen & bath.
